node.title: FloatingChat
node.description: A draggable floating chat interface with dark zinc-themed styling, containing a header, message display area, and input field with context badges.

node.title: GraphView
node.description: The main graph visualization component with ReactFlow, featuring custom nodes, edges, minimap, controls, and a dark background with tool buttons for select/pan/add-node modes.

node.title: MessageRenderer
node.description: A content renderer for parsing and displaying code blocks with Monaco Editor, featuring syntax highlighting and auto-calculated heights.

node.title: SelectedNodeSidebar
node.description: A sidebar panel for editing selected node properties with dark zinc styling, containing title/description inputs and property editors with debounced saving.

node.title: SelectionBadge
node.description: Badge components for displaying file, area, and node selections with icons and remove buttons, featuring outline styling with zinc colors.

node.title: TopBar
node.description: A minimal top header bar with dark zinc styling and empty flex containers for future content expansion.

node.title: WelcomeScreen
node.description: A full-screen welcome interface displaying template cards with images, featuring dark zinc background and interactive template selection with loading states.

node.title: BasePropertyEditor
node.description: Base wrapper component for property editors with label styling and optional right slot for actions, using zinc color scheme.

node.title: BooleanPropertyEditor
node.description: Boolean property editor with switch control and clickable On/Off labels, featuring blue/zinc color states and scaled styling.

node.title: CheckboxPropertyEditor
node.description: Checkbox property editor supporting both single boolean values and multi-select groups with zinc-styled checkboxes and labels.

node.title: ColorPropertyEditor
node.description: Color picker property editor with hex input, color preview button, and popover containing HexColorPicker component with dark zinc styling.

node.title: FontPropertyEditor
node.description: Font family selector with dropdown containing default Google Fonts list and preview on hover, using dark zinc select styling.

node.title: NumberPropertyEditor
node.description: Number input with increment/decrement buttons using React Aria Components, featuring tabular-nums and zinc styling with step controls.

node.title: ObjectListPropertyEditor
node.description: Dynamic list editor for arrays of objects with collapsible items, add/remove buttons, and nested property editors with zinc styling.

node.title: ObjectPropertyEditor
node.description: Collapsible object editor for grouped properties with chevron expansion indicator and nested property editors with zinc styling.

props.prop: No fields defined for this group.

node.title: RadioPropertyEditor
node.description: Radio button group editor with vertical layout and zinc-styled radio buttons with labels for single-option selection.

node.title: SelectPropertyEditor
node.description: Dropdown select editor with option previewing on hover and zinc-styled select component for single option selection.

node.title: SliderPropertyEditor
node.description: Slider control for numeric ranges with custom zinc styling and configurable min/max/step values using shadcn/ui slider component.

node.title: TextAreaPropertyEditor
node.description: Adaptive text editor that switches between input and textarea based on content length and line breaks, with zinc styling and focus preservation.

node.title: PropertyEditorIndex
node.description: Main property editor router component that selects the appropriate editor based on property type, handling all supported editor types with change and preview callbacks.

node.title: Home Page
node.description: Main application page component that handles project management interface with resizable panels, graph view, and chat functionality

node.title: Chat Service
node.description: React hook for managing chat state and API communication. Handles message sending, chat history loading/saving, streaming responses, and context management including file selection and node selection.

props.prop: I processed your request but received no response content.

node.title: Project Store
node.description: Zustand-based global state management store handling file system operations, graph state, selected nodes, and real-time updates via SSE. Manages the complete project state including files, graphs, and UI selections.

node.title: Graph Service
node.description: Core backend service for graph operations including reading/writing graphs from filesystem, SSE broadcasting, graph normalization, and state management. Handles both current and base graph persistence.

node.title: Agent Request API
node.description: Main API endpoint for processing user requests through Claude Code. Handles request validation, context forwarding, and response streaming. Routes to Claude Code execution engine.

node.title: Schema Definitions
node.description: Zod-based schema definitions for type validation across the application. Defines structures for graphs, nodes, properties, messages, and API requests/responses.

node.title: Graph Diff Service
node.description: Utility service for analyzing differences between base and current graphs. Automatically marks nodes as built/unbuilt based on changes and provides diff analysis for graph synchronization.

node.title: Graph XML Converter
node.description: Utility service for converting between Graph objects and XML format. Handles complex property serialization including nested objects, arrays, and various property types with proper escaping.

node.title: UI Utils
node.description: Frontend utility functions for class name management and component styling. Provides Tailwind CSS class merging and conditional styling utilities using clsx and tailwind-merge.

node.title: Chat API Route
node.description: API endpoint for managing chat history persistence. Handles GET requests to load chat history, POST requests to save chat messages, and DELETE requests to clear conversation history.

node.title: Graph API Route
node.description: Main API endpoint for graph operations including reading/writing current and base graphs, SSE streaming, and property updates. Supports XML format and real-time synchronization.

node.title: Files API Route
node.description: API endpoint for file system operations including reading file trees, getting file contents, and updating files. Provides project file management with caching and tree structure support.

node.title: Claude Code Execute
node.description: API endpoint that interfaces with Claude Code CLI for executing AI-powered development tasks. Handles prompt processing, streaming responses, and integration with the graph editing workflow.

node.title: Graph Editor Tools
node.description: Utility service providing graph editing capabilities including node creation, updates, deletion, and edge management. Supports both optimistic UI updates and persistent storage operations.

node.title: Project Config
node.description: Configuration management service for project settings including development directory paths, environment detection, and project structure configuration.
